info.name: Tiny Clouds (247 chars)
info.description:
re-golfing [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/lsBfDz[/url] that was 280 chars reinterpretation of iq's iconic clouds shader [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XslGRr[/url].

using 3D texture, #define, etc.   -33 chars.   201 chars without color & jittering.
